short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play video, streams from any sources!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CVPlayer is a robust and flexible Chrome extension that allows you to play a variety of online video formats, including HLS, MPEG-DASH, MP4, M3U8, and others. Developed using Plyr, this player offers features like speed and volume control, picture-in-picture mode, and full-screen mode.

The extension comes with a host of advanced features that allow you to enjoy content from any source. These include the ability to add or set request and response headers, and the use of our thoroughly tested templates to build request/response headers. You can also embed our web player, available at our website, into your own sites to enjoy all the advanced features, provided the extension is installed.

CVPlayer enhances your online video viewing experience, allowing you to watch videos in any format from any website seamlessly. For more information, visit our website.
